src: “Diabetiko izateari utzi dioten 4 hilabeteko saguak ditugu orain” gehitu zuen.
mt: 4 month old guinea pigs who have been cured of diabetes are ours now he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Ehud Ur doktoreak ohartarazi du ikerketa hasierako fasean dagoela oraindik. Doktorea medikuntza-irakaslea da Halifax-eko (Eskozia Berria) Dalhousie Unibertsitatean eta Kanadako Diabetes Elkarteko atal kliniko eta zientifikoko zuzendaria da.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur cautioned that the research is still in its early stages. Dr. Ur is a medical educator at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and the clinical and scientific director of the Canadian Diabetes Association.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Beste aditu batzuk bezala, eszeptikoa da diabetesa sendatzeko aukerari buruz, eta nabarmendu du aurkikuntza horiek ez dutela inolako garrantzirik dagoeneko 1 motako diabetesa duten pertsonentzat.
mt: Like other experts, he is skeptical about the prospects for curing diabetes, and he points out that the findings do not have any immediate relevance for people with type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Astelehenean, Sara Danius-ek, Suediako Akademiako Literaturako Nobelaren Batzordeko idazkari iraunkorrak, publikoki azaldu zuen Suediako Sveriges Radio-ko irrati-programa batean bertan behera utzi zutela Bob Dylan-ekin zuzenean harremanetan jartzeko ahalegina, 2016ko Literaturako Nobel Saria irabazi duela jakinarazteko.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Literature Committee, publicly announced that she had dropped efforts to contact Bob Dylan directly to inform him of his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius-en hitzetan, “Une honetan ez gara ezer egiten ari. Gertuen duen kolaboratzaileari deitu eta mezu elektronikoak bidali dizkiot, eta erantzun oso abegikorrak jaso ditut. Oraingoz, hori da guztia.”
mt: “We’re not doing anything right now. I’m contacting the closest collaborator and sending him e-mails, and I’ve received very kind replies. That’s all for now.”
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Horren aurretik, Jamie Siminoff-ek, Ring-eko zuzendari exekutiboak, azaldu zuen garajeko tailerretik etxeko txirrina entzun ezin zelako abian jarri zuela enpresa.
mt: Before that, Jamie Siminoff, the company's executive director, said he couldn't get the garage doorbell to ring from his home.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: WiFi txirrin bat sortu zuela esan zuen.
mt: He claimed to have invented a WiFi trinket.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff-en esanean, 2013an Shark Tank saioaren atal batean agertu ondoren handitu ziren salmentak, saioko epaileek enpresa abian jartzeko dirulaguntza ez ematea erabaki ondoren.
mt: 2013, after appearing on Shark Tank, sales increased after the show's judges decided not to invest in the company.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017 amaiera aldera, QVC erosketa telebista-kanalean agertu zen Siminoff.
mt: 2017, QVC shopping channel featured Siminoff.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Horrez gain, Ring-ek haren lehiakide zen ADT Corporation segurtasun-enpresarekin zuen auzia ebatzi zen.
mt: Additionally, Ring was also found guilty of antitrust violations against its competitor ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Txerto esperimental batek ebolak eragindako hilkortasuna murrizteko gaitasuna duela badirudi ere, ez dago infekzioa tratatzeko egokia dela argi erakutsi duen botikarik.
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to have the ability to reduce mortality from Ebola, there is no clear evidence of a drug that is effective in treating the infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: ZMapp antigorputz-koktela esparru horretan erabil zitekeela zirudien arren, egindako ikerketa formalek erakutsi zuten heriotza saihesteko garaian nahi baino onura txikiagoa eragiten zuela.
mt: ZMapp antiviral cocktail was thought to be effective in the outbreak, but formal studies showed it was less effective than hoped in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM entseguan, ZMapp kontrol gisa erabili zen; hau da, ikerlariek hura oinarri gisa erabili zuten eta horrekin alderatu zituzten beste hiru tratamenduak.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control; that is, researchers used it as a baseline and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics elkarteak bat egiten du Estatu Batuetako Batzorde Olinpikoaren gutunarekin, eta onartu du ezinbestekoa dela familia olinpikoak atleta guztientzako ingurumen segurua sustatzea.
mt: USA Gymnastics has agreed to a letter from the U.S. Olympic Committee, and has agreed that it is necessary to ensure a safe environment for all athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Ados gaude USOCen adierazpenarekin, zeinak esan baitu atleten, kluben eta haien kirolaren interesak hobeto babestuko direla gure antolamenduaren barruan aldaketa esanguratsuak eginda, ziurtapenak kenduta baino.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that our athletes, clubs and the sport's interests will be better served by significant changes made within our structure, without the guarantees.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics ikerketa independente bat sustatzen ari da, Larry Nassar-en abusuak pairatu dituztenek ausardiaz azaldutako gertakari larriak hain luzaroan detektatu gabe nola egon diren argitzeko, eta beharrezkoak diren aldaketa egokiak abian jartzeko.
mt: USA Gymnastics is launching an independent investigation to determine how serious allegations of abuse by Larry Nassar were not detected for so long and to implement appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics eta USOC elkarteek helburu bera dute: gimnasia eta bestelako kirolak ahalik eta seguruenak izatea, atletek ahalduntzeko aukera izan eta ingurumen seguru eta positiboan bete ahal izan ditzaten beren ametsak.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC share the same goal: to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible, to provide opportunities for athletes to achieve their dreams in a safe and positive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 1960ko hamarkadan, John F. Kennedy-ren aholkulari gisa lan egin zuen Brzezinski-k, eta, ondoren, Lyndon B. Johnson-en administrazioan.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy, and later in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 1976ko hauteskundeetan, atzerriko politikei buruzko aholkuak eman zizkion Carter-i, eta, ondoren, Segurtasun nazionaleko aholkulari (NSA) gisa lan egin zuen 1977tik 1981era, Henry Kissinger-en ordezko gisa.
mt: 1976, Carter advised him on foreign policy, and later served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, as Kissinger's deputy.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: NSA izan zen bitartean, munduko gaiak era diplomatikoan kudeatzen lagundu zion Carter-i, besteak beste, Camp David-eko Hitzarmenetan (1978), AEB-Txina harremanetan 1970. hamarkadaren azken urteetan, Irango Iraultzan eta haren ondorengo Teherango gatibuen krisialdian (1979), eta Sobietarrek Afganistan inbaditzean (1979).
mt: While serving as NSA, Carter helped manage world affairs diplomatically, including the Camp David Accords (1978), Sino-American relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution and its aftermath in the Tehran hostage crisis (1979), and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan (1979).
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Ryan Gosling eta Emma Stone protagonista dituen filmak izendapenak jaso zituen kategoria nagusi guztietan.
mt: 2017's La La Land won awards in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling-ek eta Stone-k Aktore onenen sarirako izendapenak jaso zituzten.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Beste izendapen batzuen artean, hauek daude: film onena, zuzendaria, zinematografia, jantzien diseinua, film-edizioa, jatorrizko musika, ekoizpen-diseinua, soinu-edizioa, soinu-nahasketa eta jatorrizko gidoia.
mt: Other categories include: best picture, director, cinematography, costume design, film editing, original music score, art direction, sound editing, sound mixing and original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Filmeko bi abestik —”Audition (The Fools Who Dream)” eta “City of Stars”— abesti original onenaren izendapena jaso zuten. Lionsgate estudioak 26 izendapen jaso zituen, beste edozein estudiok baino gehiago.
mt: 2 songs from the film — “Audition (The Fools Who Dream)” and “City of Stars” — won the award for best original song. Lionsgate studios won 26 nominations, more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Igande arratsaldean, Donald Trump Estatu Batuetako Presidenteak prentsa-idazkariaren bidez bidalitako adierazpenean iragarri zuen AEBko tropek Siria utziko dutela.
mt: On Sunday afternoon, Donald Trump, President of the United States, announced in a statement released through his press secretary that US troops will be leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Recep Tayyip Erdoğan Turkiako presidentearekin telefonoz hitz egin ondoren egin zuen iragarpena Trump-ek.
mt: He made the announcement after speaking by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkiak bere gain hartuko luke harrapatutako ISIS-eko borrokalarien zaintza; haren esanean, Europako nazioek ez dituzte aberriratu nahi.
mt: Turkey will take responsibility for the care of ISIS fighters captured in Syria; its request is that European nations do not want to repatriate them.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Horrek baieztatu egiten du dinosauro batzuek behintzat lumak dituztela dioen teoria eta, gainera, fosilek oro har eman ez ditzaketen xehetasun batzuk erakusten ditu, besteak beste, kolorea eta hiru dimentsiotako antolamendua.
mt: This confirms the theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers and also shows details that fossils in general cannot show, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Zientzialariek diote animaliaren lumajea gaztaina-kolorekoa zela goiko aldean eta karotenoide-kolore edo kolore apalekoa azpialdean.
mt: Scientists say the animal's fur was reddish-brown on top and yellowish or pale-colored on the underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Aurkikuntzak, gainera, lumek hegaztietan izan duten bilakaerari buruzko xehetasunak ematen ditu.
mt: The findings also shed light on the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Dinosauroen lumek ez dute ongi garatutako estalkia (errakia izenekoa) baina badituzte lumen beste ezaugarri batzuk (luma-bizarrak); horregatik, ikertzaileek ondorioztatu dute errakia eboluzioan beranduago garatu zela aipatu beste ezaugarriak baino.
mt: The dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed sheath (the rachis) but they have other feather characteristics (rachis); therefore, researchers concluded that the rachis evolved later than the other characteristics mentioned.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Lumaren egituratik ondoriozta daiteke ez zirela hegan egiteko erabiltzen, tenperatura erregulatzeko edo itxura aldatzeko baizik. Ikertzaileen proposamenaren arabera, dinosauro gazte baten isatsa bada ere, laginak lumaje heldua erakusten du, ez kume baten lumatxa.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, temperature regulation or appearance. The researchers' proposal is that the tail of a young dinosaur is being shown, not the down of a chick.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Ikertzaileen proposamenaren arabera, dinosauro gazte baten isatsa bada ere, laginak lumaje heldua erakusten du, ez kume baten lumatxa.
mt: The proposal of the researchers is that the tail of a young dinosaur, but the samples show adult fur, not a cub's down.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Auto-bonba batek eztanda egin zuen atzo goizean Gaziantep-eko (Turkia) polizia-kuartelean. Bi polizia hil eta hogei pertsona baino gehiago zauritu zituen.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and over 20 people were injured when a car bomb exploded at a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Gobernadorearen bulegokoek esan dutenez, zaurituetatik hemeretzi poliziak ziren.
mt: 18 police officers were injured, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Poliziaren esanean, Daesh-eko (ISIL) militante bat izan liteke erasoaren arduraduna.
mt: Police say a Daesh (ISIL) militant may be responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Aurkikuntzaren arabera, gainerako izarrek dituzten oinarrizko printzipioen arabera funtzionatzen du Eguzkiak ere: sistemako izar guztietan argitasunak eta haien errotazioak gidatzen du jarduera, beste ezerk ez.
mt: It is believed to work according to the basic principles of the other stars: the activity of the system is guided by the luminosity and rotation of all the stars, nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Argitasuna eta errotazioa batera erabiltzen dira izar baten Rosby zenbakia zehazteko, eta hori plasmaren fluxuarekin erlazionatuta dago.
mt: Rotation and brightness are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the plasma flux.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Zenbat eta txikiagoa izan Rossby zenbaki, orduan eta jarduera txikiagoa du izarrak inbertsio magnetikoei dagokienez.
mt: The smaller the Rossby number, the less activity there is in the reversal of the sun's magnetic field.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Bidaian zehar, behin baino gehiagotan izan zituen arazoak Iwasaki-k.
mt: During the flight, Iwasaki had several problems.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Piratek lapurreta egin zioten, Tibet-en amorrua zuen txakur batek eraso egin zion, Nepalen ezkontza batetik ihes egin zuen eta Indian atxilotu egin zuten.
mt: 1. Pirates raided, a Tibetan dog attacked, a Nepalese wedding was crashed, and an Indian was arrested.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n estandarrak 2.4Ghz eta 5.0Ghz maiztasunetan funtzionatzen du.
mt: 802.11n standard works at 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Horri esker, 802.11a, 802.11b eta 802.11g-rekin bateragarria izango da, oinarri-estazioak banda bikoitza baldin badu.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g compatible, if the base station has dual band.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n-ren abiadurak nabarmen azkarragoak dira aurrekoenak baino, eta 600Mbit/s-ko errendimendu maximo teorikoa du.
mt: 802.11n speeds are much faster than previous ones, and has a theoretical maximum performance of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall ezkonduta dago eta bi seme-alaba heldu ditu, eta ez zuen eragin askorik izan Miller-engan, istorioa harekin erlazionatuta zegoen arren.
mt: Duvall is married and has two adult children, and the incident had little effect on Miller, who was related to the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Horren inguruko iritzia eskatu zitzaionean, Miller-ek honela esan zuen: “Mike-k asko hitz egiten du saioak irauten duen bitartean...Ni prestatzen ari nintzen, eta ez nengoen esaten ari zenari arreta jartzen.”
mt: When asked for his opinion, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the show...I was getting ready, and I wasn't paying attention to what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “GDP unitateko karbono dioxidoaren igorpenak nabarmen murriztuko ditugu 2020rako, 2005eko mailarekin alderatuta” esan du Hu-k.
mt: “We will significantly reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by 2020, compared to 2005,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Ez du murrizketen zenbakirik eman, haren esanean Txinako emaitza ekonomikoetan oinarrituta egingo baitira.
mt: He has not given a number for the cuts, saying they will be based on China's economic performance.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu-k garapen bidean dauden herrialdeei eskatu die “orain arte kutsatu eta gero garbitzean oinarritutako bidea alde batera uzteko”.
mt: He called on developing countries to "move away from the path of pollute and then clean up".
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Gehitu duenez, “ez litzaieke behartu beharko haien garapen-mailatik, arduratik eta gaitasunetik haratago dauden betebeharrik betetzera.”
mt: “…they should not be required to perform duties beyond their level of development, responsibility and competence.”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Irak-eko Ikasketa Taldeak txostena aurkeztu du gaur 12:00etan (GMT).
mt: 12:00 GMT, the Research Team has submitted the article.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ohartarazten duenez, inork ezin du bermatu Iraken egindako edozein ekintzak geldiarazi ahal izango dituenik gerra sektarioa, areagotzen ari den indarkeria edo kaoseranzko gainbehera.
mt: It is noted that no one can guarantee that any action taken in Iraq will stop sectarian war, the increasing violence or chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Txostenaren hasieran, eztabaida irekia egiteko eskatzen da, baita Estatu Batuetan Ekialde Hurbilerako politikei buruzko adostasuna lortzeko ere.
mt: The statement begins by calling for an open debate, and also for agreement on U.S. policy towards the Near East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Txostenak zorrotz kritikatzen ditu gobernu exekutiboak Irak-en aplikatzen duen politikaren alderdi guztiak, eta berehalako norabide-aldaketa eskatzen du.
mt: The report sharply criticizes the executive government's policy in all aspects in Iraq, and calls for an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Jasotzen dituen 78 gomendioen artean aipatzen da ekimen diplomatiko berri bati ekin behar zaiola urtearen amaiera baino lehen, Irak-eko mugak kontrako esku-hartzeetatik babesteko eta bizilagunekin harreman diplomatikoak berrezartzeko.
mt: 78 recommendations are listed, including the need to take new diplomatic action before the end of the year to protect Iraq's borders from cross-border actions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner senatariak eta Argentinako lehen damak lehendakari izateko hauteskundeetarako hautagaitzaren berri eman zuen atzo iluntzean La Plata-n, Buenos Aires-etik 50 kilometrora (31 miliara) dagoen hirian.
mt: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, a senator and the first lady of Argentina, announced her candidacy for president in a speech Monday night in La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) south of Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Kirschner-ek Argentina Antzokian azaldu zuen bere helburua lehendakari izatea dela. Toki berean iragarri zuen 2005ean senatari izateko kanpaina, Buenos Aires-eko probintziako ordezkaritzako kide zenean.
mt: Kirschner said his goal was to become president. In the same place he announced his campaign for senator in 2005, when he was a member of the Buenos Aires province's delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Katrina urakanaren ondoren laguntzetan eta berreraikitzean gastatutako diruaren inguruko gorabeherak piztu zuen eztabaida. Zenbait legegile kontserbadorek “Bush-en New Orleans-eko negozioa” izena ezarri zioten umorez.
mt: A debate was sparked over the fluctuations in the amount of money spent on relief and rebuilding after Hurricane Katrina. Some conservative lawmakers jokingly referred to it as "Bush's New Orleans business deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Itxuraz, Washington-eko informazio pribilegiatua zutenei berreraikuntza-kontratuak ematean zentratu dira liberalek berreraikitzeko ahaleginei egindako kritikak.
mt: Liberal critics of the administration's efforts to rebuild have focused on contracts awarded to those with privileged access to information.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Lau milioi pertsona baino gehiago joan ziren Erromara hileta elizkizunetan parte hartzeko.
mt: 4 million people or more attended funeral services in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Hainbeste pertsona bertaratu zen, ezen guztiek ezin baitzuten hileta elizkizunetarako sarbidea izan San Pedro plazan.
mt: So many people gathered that not everyone could get into the funeral mass at St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Hainbat telebista-pantaila erraldoi ezarri ziren Erromako zenbait tokitan, jendeak zeremonia ikusteko aukera izan zezan.
mt: Several large television screens were set up in various locations in Rome, so people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Italiako eta munduko gainerako beste hiri askotan, batez ere Polonian, antzekoak antolatu ziren, eta pertsona ugarik kusi zuten ekitaldia.
mt: Similar events were held in Italy and other cities around the world, especially in Poland, and many people booed the event.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historialariek FBIren iraganeko gidalerroak kritikatu dituzte, ebazteko errazak ziren kasuetan -bereziki lapurtutako autoen kasuetan- baliabide ugari jartzeagatik, agentziaren arrakasta-tasa igotzeko asmoz egin zutelakoan.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI for using vast resources in easy cases - especially car thefts - in order to boost its success rate, allegedly.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongresua lizunkeria ekimena diruz laguntzen hasi zen 2005. urte fiskalean, eta zehaztu zuen FBIk 10 agente bideratu behar izan zituela helduen pornografiara.
mt: 2005 was the first year Congress funded the program, and the FBI said it needed 10 agents to investigate adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa-k izan zuen sarrera-puntuazio altuena: 70 korrikaldi 41 pilotarekin, 11 lauko eta 2 seiko jota.
mt: 70 runs scored by Robin Uthappa, 41 fours and 11 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Sachin Tendulkar eta Rahul Dravid ordena ertaineko bate-jotzaileek ere lan ona egin zuten, ehun puntuko kidetza eginda.
mt: Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid also played well, scoring a hundred each.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Alabaina, kapitainaren wicket-a galdu ondoren, Indiak 36 puntu soilik lortu zituen, eta sarreren amaieran 7 wicket galdu zituzten.
mt: However, after losing the captain's wicket, India scored only 36 runs, and lost 7 wickets by the end of the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: George W. Bush AEBetako presidentea azaroaren 16an iritsi zen Singapurrera, Asian zehar astebetez egingo zuen birari hasiera emanez.
mt: 16 November 2006, George W. Bush, President of the United States, arrived in Singapore, to begin a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Wong Kan Seng Singapurreko Ordezko Lehen Ministroak egin zion harrera, eta merkataritzari eta terrorismo-gaiei buruz hitz egin zuen Lee Hsien Loong Singapurreko Lehen Ministroarekin.
mt: Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng received him, and discussed trade and terrorism with Lee Hsien Loong, Singapore's Prime Minister.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Legealdiaren erdiko hauteskundeetan astebetez galtzen joan ondoren, Bush-ek ikus-entzuleei azaldu zien Asian negozioak hedatzeko helburua zuela.
mt: 7 days after losing the mid-term elections, Bush told his audience that his goal was to expand business in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Stephen Harpen lehen ministroak adostu du gobernuaren ‘Clean Air Act’ delakoa alderdi guztiekin osatutako batzorde batera bidaliko duela, berrikus dezan, bigarren aldiz irakurri aurretik, lehen ministroaren bulegoan Jack Layton NDPren buruarekin asteartean 25 minutuko bilera izan eta gero.
mt: Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to a committee made up of all parties for review before a second reading, after a 25 minute meeting with Jack Layton NDP leader in the Prime Minister's office on Monday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton-ek kontserbadoreen ingurumeneko lege-proiektuan aldaketak egiteko eskatu zuen lehen ministroarekin izan zuen bileran, eta alderdi kontserbadorearen ingurumeneko lege-proiektua “goitik behera berridazteko” eskaera egin zuen.
mt: Layton asked the premier to amend the Conservative Party's environment bill in a meeting, and asked the Conservative Party to "completely rework" its environment bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Gobernu Federalak Tasmaniako Devonport hiriko Mersey ospitaleko funtsen kontrola hartu duenetik, estatuko gobernuak eta parlamentu federaleko zenbait kidek ekintza hori kritikatu egin dute, eta azaroan abian jarriko diren hauteskunde federalei begira egindako mugimendu gisa ikusi dute.
mt: The Federal Government has taken control of the finances of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, since the state government and some members of the federal parliament have criticized this action, and have seen it as a move in the upcoming federal elections in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: John Howard lehen ministroak esan du ekintza hori ospitalearen instalazioak babesteko egin dela, Tasmaniako gobernuak kategoriaz jaitsi aurretik, eta AUD$45 milioi gehigarri eman ditu.
mt: John Howard, the prime minister, said the action was taken to protect the hospital's facilities before the Tasmanian government downgraded its category, and has added an extra AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Azken txostenaren arabera, itsas-mailaren erregistroak erakutsi du tsunami bat sortu zela. Tsunami-jarduera argia erregistratu zen Pago Pago eta Niue inguruan.
mt: The latest report states that ship's log records show a tsunami was generated.  Strong tsunami activity was recorded around Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Ez da kalteen edo zaurituen berri eman Tonga-n, baina argindarra eten egin zen aldi batean, eta, diotenez, horren erruz ez zuten jaso Tonga-ko agintariek PTWC-k igorritako tsunami-alerta.
mt: There are no reports of damage or injuries in Tonga, but power was cut for a time, and, according to reports, this prevented them from receiving the tsunami alert from PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Hawaii-n, kostan edo kostatik gertu zeuden hamalau eskola itxita zeuden asteazkenean, nahiz eta alerta-egoera amaitu den.
mt: 16 schools on the island of Hawaii or near the coast were closed on Monday, even though the alert was over.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: George W. Bush AEBetako presidenteak ontzat jo zuen iragarpena.
mt: George W. Bush, President of the United States, accepted the offer.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Bush-en bozeramaile Gordon Johndroe-k adierazi zuenez, Ipar Korearen eskaera “urrats handia da Koreako penintsularen desnuklearizazio egiaztagarria lortzera bidean.”
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the request was "a step forward" in the process of verifying North Korea's nuclear disarmament.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Atlantikoko urakan-denboraldian izendatu den hamargarren ekaitza, Jerry ekaitz subtropikala, gaur sortu da Ozeano Atlantikoan.
mt: 14th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Urakanen Zentro Nazionalak (NHC) esan duenez, une honetan Jerry ez da lurrerako arriskutsua.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Jerry is not currently a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: AEBko Ingeniarien Gorputzak zenbatetsi duenez, 6 hazbeteko euri-jasak apurtzeko arriskuan jarriko ditu lehendik hondatuta zeuden dikeak.
mt: 6-foot-high levees that were already damaged could be overtopped by floodwaters, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Bederatzigarren Distrituak, Katrina urakanak jo zuenean 20 oinetara arteko uholdeak pairatu zituenak, gerrirainoko ura du une honetan, urak ondoko dikea gainditu baitu.
mt: 20 feet of floodwaters were experienced in the 9th District, which suffered from Katrina, when the water has now surpassed the record set by the river.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: 100 oineko zabalera duen sekzio batean ari da ura diketik gainezka egiten.
mt: 100 feet wide section is filling with water from the top down.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Pasa den hilabetean Wikinews-ekin hitz egin zuenean, Komunen Ganberako Administratzaile Adam Cuerden-ek adierazi zuen frustrazioa sentitzen zuela ezabaketak direla eta.
mt: In an interview with Wikinews last month, Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden said he was frustrated by the deletions.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “[Wales-ek] gezurra esan zigun hasieratik. Lehendabizi, lege-arrazoiengatik ziharduelako itxurak egiten aritu zen. Bigarren, guri kasu egiten ari zelako itxurak egiten aritu zen, artea ezabatu zuen arte.”
mt: “[Wales] lied from the start. First, he was pretending to be sick for legal reasons. Second, he was pretending to be sick because he was making art, until he took it away.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Komunitatearen haserrea dela eta, lizentzia irekiko milioika multimedia-eduki duen webgunean eduki sexualei buruzko gidalerroa idazten ari dira.
mt: In response to community outrage, a website with millions of multimedia license-free content is writing a guide to sexual content.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Egindako lanaren gehiengoa teoriakoa zen, baina Sagitario galaxian egindako behaketak simulatzeko idatzi zen programa.
mt: 90% of the work was theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Taldea bilatzen ari zen efektua galaxiako materia ilunaren eta Esne Bideko materia ilunaren arteko marea-indarrek eragindakoa izango litzateke.
mt: The team was looking for an effect caused by the gravitational pull of dark matter in the galaxy and dark matter in the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Ilargiak Lurrean eragiten duen indarrak mareak sortzen dituen era berean, Esne Bideak indarra eragiten du Sagitario galaxian.
mt: The tides on Earth are caused by the same forces that cause the tides on the Milky Way.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Zientzialariek ondorioztatu ahal izan zuten materia ilunak beste materia ilunean eragina duela, materia arruntak duen era berean.
mt: Scientists have been able to determine that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way that ordinary matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Teoria honek esaten duenez, galaxiaren inguruko materia ilun gehiena halo baten gisan dago galaxiaren inguruan eta partikula txiki ugariz eginda dago.
mt: This theory says that most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in a halo around the galaxy and is made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Telebistako erreportajeek erakusten dute ke zuria ateratzen ari dela instalaziotik.
mt: News reports show white smoke coming from the facility.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Tokiko agintariek etxe barruan egoteko, aire girotua itzaltzeko eta iturriko ura ez edateko eskatu die inguruko biztanleei.
mt: Local officials have asked residents to stay indoors, turn off the air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Japoniako agentzia nuklearraren arabera, zesio eta iodo erradioaktiboa identifikatu dira instalazioan.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, cesium and iodine radioactivity has been identified at the facility.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Agintariek uste dute horrek esan nahi duela instalazioan uranio-erregaia gordetzen duten edukiontziak hautsita eta erregaia ateratzen hasita egon daitekeela.
mt: Officials believe this may indicate that the facility has been breached and the uranium storage tanks have been breached and the fuel is being released.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Tony Moll doktoreak Hegoafrikako KwaZulu-Natal eskualdean aurkitu zuen Botikekiko izugarri erresistentea den tuberkulosia (XDR-TB).
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered a highly resistant form of tuberculosis in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Elkarrizketa batean aipatu zuenez, aldaera berria “oso kezkagarria eta larria da, heriotza-tasa oso altua duelako.”
mt: In an interview, the new strain was described as "very serious and dangerous because of its high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Moll doktorearen ustez, litekeena da paziente batzuek ospitalean bertan gaitza harrapatu izana; horietatik bi, gutxienez, ospitaleko osasun-langileak ziren.
mt: Dr. Moll believes it is possible that some patients contracted the illness at the hospital; at least two of them were hospital health workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
